help.line: gui - Get an easier to use version of this website
man - Get more information about a command
ls - List the contents of your current directory
cat - Print the contents of a text file
For more information about a command try 'man command'

man.line: Get more information about a command.

emacs.line: Print out a text file to the terminal

vim.line: Print out a text file to the terminal

cd.line: Change your current directory. '..' is up a directory.

cat.line: Print out a text file to the terminal
